review_title: Fun time killer for little money...
one_reviews_text:
This game might not be the Invention of the wheel, and some people complain about the standing (no movement) approach the developers did, but this does not take away from a couple of very positive facts. 

First of all this game is quite fun, the first levels pretty easy but it gets harder over time. I simple describe the game as arcade, shooting gallery type of game. Having said that it does the job pretty well in compare with other shooting gallery games. 

I experienced it as pretty accurate and appreciate the realistic running around of the enemies instead of plain standing objects in some other gallery shooters. Its really fun to safe the hostages and the allover agent idea is entertaining.

Yes, it could have more content, yes it could be more complex but then you cant complain about the price! For just a view $, this is a great fun game to have. 

Also easy to play, and friends who have not much experience with VR, get it right away and start shooting stuff without the need to learn first complicated reload, etc. buttons.

The graphics and game handling are also pretty good for a cheap game like that. I give easy 4 stars and the only thing I wich is actually MORE (content) to have some more fun with it. 

The developers should be proud of this little shooter, since its much better then many others available which are more expensive.

Update, finally... installed
I have not had the time to try out the game, so I cannot give a review yet, will put it at 3 stars for now just because it installed ok ;)

review_title: Do not give me a real gun
one_reviews_text:
One likes blondes and the other brunette.
Who doesn't want to be an agent. I like this game.

review_title: For the price its a fun game
one_reviews_text:
So I got this game for $5 and played for 20 minutes, it did lock up on me once.
I look forward to more content but even if this is it I appreciate the game for the price.
Well done
I will change to 5 if you release more content lol yes blackmale
review_feedback:
Hello,

Thanks for playing our game and leaving a review. The team is working on a new version currently and we are making quite some changes. We hope we are able to release the update soon.

Kind Regards!

one_reviews_text: wow stand in one spot and shoot stuff really? tring to get refund but  order history wont let me so now what cant get ahold of suport just  automated questions
review_feedback:
Hello,

Thanks for checking out our game. Sorry to hear you didn't like it.

Our goal was to make a shooter with puzzle elements. This is among the reasons why there is no movement in the game.
